metadata.title: CVE-2013-1888 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
pip before 1.3 allows local users to overwrite arbitrary files via asymlink attack on a file in the /tmp/pip-build temporary directory.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-1888` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-pip - 1.3.1-0ubuntu1
python3-pip - 1.3.1-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-pip package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.1-0ubuntu1').
